001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.adapter;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.view.LayoutInflater;
005import android.view.View;
006import android.view.ViewGroup;
007import android.widget.ArrayAdapter;
008import android.widget.ImageView;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block.ShapeType;
013import java.util.List;
014
015public class NextQueueAdapter extends ArrayAdapter<ShapeType> {
016
017  private final List<ShapeType> queue;
018  private final LayoutInflater inflater;
019
020  public NextQueueAdapter(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull List<ShapeType> queue) {
021    super(context, R.layout.item_next_queue, queue);
022    this.queue = queue;
023    inflater = LayoutInflater.from(context);
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public int getCount() {
028    return queue.size();
029  }
030
031  @NonNull
032  @Override
033  public View getView(int position, @Nullable View convertView, @NonNull ViewGroup parent) {
034    ShapeType shape = queue.get(position);
035    int level = shape.ordinal();
036    ImageView view = (ImageView) ((convertView != null)
037            ? convertView
038            : inflater.inflate(R.layout.item_next_queue, parent, false));
039    view.getDrawable().setLevel(level);
040    return view;
041  }
042}
